name: Caught on Tape - Early Access
description:
THE GAME :

Experience a first-person stealth/horror game in which you play as an urban explorer investigating the ruins of Fort Alexander.

The fort is an infamous place in the world of urban exploration, as it is well-known for the horrible human experiments rumoured to have happened there. It's finally time for you to find out whether all these rumours are true, as you first enter the fort, camera in-hand.

While exploring, the ground suddenly collapses under your feet, and you wake up hours later, lost. Find and collect the remnants of old experiments that will help you escape, without getting noticed by the bloodthirsty monsters roaming these ruins.

--------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Movement:

  • WASD to move 
  • Space to Jump and Vault over obstacles / Space x2 to mantle onto higher objects 
  • Shift to Sprint 
  • Ctrl or C to Crouch 
  • E or Q to Lean near walls 
  • LAlt to Look Backwards 

Abilities:

  • LMB or F to Interact with highlighted objects 
  • RMB to Turn On/Off the Camera 
  • Mouse Wheel to Switch between Camera Modes when Camera is turned on 
  • R to Reload Camera Battery 

Other:

  • Esc to open the Pause Menu

--------------------------------------
